TREATMENT PLAN/REGIMEN DESCRIPTION', '5.1', 'Chemotherapy/Hormonal Therapy/Other Agent-Based Therapy', 'For patients receiving RT + androgen deprivation therapy (ADT), ADT may begin at any', 'time following Step I registration but prior to the start of RT. ADT prior to Step I', 'registration is allowed but, patient may have received prior ADT for up to 6 weeks (42', 'days) prior to Step 1 registration.', '5.1.1 Androgen Deprivation Therapy (ADT)', 'Any LHRH agonist/antagomist with or without an oral antiandrogen can be used;', 'however, ADT cannot be administered for more than a 6 month administration dose (i.e.', 'for Lupron this would be 45 mg, etc.).
